page.title: 18CHILDREN'S SPORT
page.content: At cubs we have a football team called the 3rd Andover Cubs.Our colour is a gold top with black shorts. Another team is 1st Jubilee.They have just played in Middle Wallop. Sports Day is one of the most exciting days at school.Our three house teams have to sit in pens and watch.We are allowed to cheer.A few people in each house bring along a mascot like a teddy.When you come in 1st,2nd or 3rd you get a card and someone writes your name and house. Some of the races are the sack race, skipping,sprint and relay. In the sack race you jump in a sack to the end. We have a tube called a baton to pass in the relay race.
